1.16.5.1.0.9:
add command for leaving your current team as non-op player - MelanX
add issue templates on github and improve "wiki" - MelanX
add command to create and join a team (useful for servers) - MelanX
prevent commands from being used in non-skyblock worlds - MelanX
players drop all their items when leaving a team - MelanX
fix overworld on servers - MelanX
add ability to invite users and they can accept + fix some joining/leaving issues (new world should be generated) - MelanX
1.16.5.1.0.8:
fix end island not generating correctly - MelanX
make disable bastions and nether fortress be configurable - MelanX
change config paths -> new config required - MelanX
add void end closes #4 - MelanX
fix some structures still being generated - MelanX
add config for generating stronghold only closes #3 - MelanX
add config for spawn height - MelanX
1.16.5.1.0.7:
add config for spawn direction - MelanX
fix structure generation closes #1 - MelanX
fix teleportation to spawn when rejoining and still in no team closes #2 - MelanX
1.16.5.1.0.6:
change release type to "beta" - MelanX
adjust clear command to only clear one team -> all players will be removed - MelanX
fix players which aren't online are not being teleported - MelanX
1.16.5.1.0.5:
fix players not being teleported to spawn when team was deleted - MelanX
fix nether on server not being void - MelanX
1.16.5.1.0.4: initial curseforge release + adding wiki - MelanX
